title: Fakeers of the east
creator_credit: Van Beuren Corporation and RKO Radio Pictures
brief_description: Shows some amazing sleight of hand and other tricks by Indian Fakeers including the sname charm with two cobras and other animal tricks. Narration by Alois Havrilla.
